page.title: HP Profit Tops Lowered Forecast
page.text: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Hewlett-Packard Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HPQ.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HPQ.N</A> on Tuesday said quarterly profit topped its own lowered expectations as the computer and printer maker saw record revenues in every business and every region, sending shares higher by 9 percent.
